mapper.select: SELECT T1.BASE_YM /* 기준년월 */ , T1.WARE_NO /* 창고번호 */ , T1.PD_CD /* 상품코드 */ , T1.CNFM_PITM_STR_GAP_QTY /* 확정시점입고차이수량 */ , T1.CNFM_PITM_OSTR_GAP_QTY /* 확정시점출고차이수량 */ , T2.PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY /* 시점재고A등급수량 */ , T3.PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY AS CST_PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY /* 고객시점재고A등급수량 */ FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_STOC_ACINSP_IZ T1 /* 월별재고실사내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_SVST_MCITM_STOC_IZ T2 /* 월별품목재고내역 */ ON T2.BASE_YM = T1.BASE_YM AND T2.WARE_NO = T1.WARE_NO AND T2.ITM_PD_CD = T1.PD_CD INNER JOIN TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_STOC_IZ T3 /* 고객서비스품목재고내역 */ ON T3.WARE_NO = T1.WARE_NO AND T3.ITM_PD_CD = T1.PD_CD WHERE T1.CNFMDT IS NOT NULL AND T1.IOST_RFDT IS NULL AND T1.BASE_YM = #{baseYm} AND T1.WARE_NO = #{wareNo} AND T1.PD_CD = #{itmPdCd} AND ((T1.CNFM_PITM_STR_GAP_QTY IS NOT NULL AND T1.CNFM_PITM_STR_GAP_QTY > 0) OR (T1.CNFM_PITM_OSTR_GAP_QTY IS NOT NULL AND T1.CNFM_PITM_OSTR_GAP_QTY > 0))

update.foreach:
UPDATE TB_SVST_MCBY_STOC_ACINSP_IZ /* 월별재고실사내역 */ SET IOST_RFDT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') /* 입출고반영일자 */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND BASE_YM = #{item.baseYm} /* 기준년월 */ AND WARE_NO = #{item.wareNo} /* 창고번호 */ AND PD_CD = #{item.pdCd} /* 상품코드 */

mapper.select: SELECT T1.BASE_YM /* 기준년월 */ , T1.WARE_NO /* 창고번호 */ , T1.PD_CD /* 품목코드 */ , NVL(T2.PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY, 0) AS CNFM_PITM_EOT_STOC_QTY /* 확정시점기말재고수량 */ , T1.ACINSP_QTY /* 실사수량 */ , ( CASE WHEN T1.ACINSP_QTY - NVL(T2.PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY,0) > 0 THEN T1.ACINSP_QTY - NVL(T2.PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS CNFM_PITM_STR_GAP_QTY /* 확정시점입고차이수량 */ , ( CASE WHEN T1.ACINSP_QTY - NVL(T2.PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY,0) < 0 THEN NVL(T2.PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY,0) - T1.ACINSP_QTY ELSE 0 END ) AS CNFM_PITM_OSTR_GAP_QTY /* 확정시점출고차이수량 */ FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_STOC_ACINSP_IZ T1 /* 월별재고실사내역 */ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVST_MCITM_STOC_IZ T2 /* 월별품목재고내역 */ ON T2.BASE_YM = T1.BASE_YM AND T2.WARE_NO = T1.WARE_NO AND T2.ITM_PD_CD = T1.PD_CD WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.PD_CD = #{itmPdCd} AND T1.BASE_YM = #{apyYm} AND T1.CNFMDT IS NOT NULL AND T1.IOST_RFDT IS NULL

delete.foreach:
UPDATE TB_SVST_MCBY_STOC_ACINSP_IZ /* 월별재고실사내역 */ SET CNFMDT = '' , CNFM_PITM_EOT_STOC_QTY = '' , CNFM_PITM_STR_GAP_QTY = '' , CNFM_PITM_OSTR_GAP_QTY = ''
WHERE 1 = 1 AND BASE_YM = #{item.baseYm} /* 기준년월 */ AND WARE_NO = #{item.wareNo} /* 창고번호 */ AND PD_CD = #{item.pdCd} /* 상품코드 */
